doc.title: O thriamvos tou hronou
doc.plot: A timeless poetic expedition in the global museum of arrogance with Don Quixote for a guide. Like another Prometheus Don Quixote comes face to face with his Creator. He is transformed into a warrior and leads the souls-inhabitants of his world to an imaginary paradise. The Spanish Ulysses follows the golden age of Western civilization as his frustration and guilt and journeys to the twentieth century where this civilization begins to crumble amid the contradictions of its contemporary fiction.
